subject: re:Can't afford drugs you need?
body:
Dear valued member.
With this special pharmaceutical bulletin we introduce MyCanadianPharmacy providing high quality products at low cost.
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Save money buying cheaper Canadian products.Our products are manufactured according to the same strict medical standards as US medications.
For more information click herehttp://canthis.hk
Secure online ordering process serves to guarantee high level of confidentiality.
Yours faithfully,Queen Paulson
